title: RTX 3070: LossTensor is inf or nan
body:
my error when I start training. Recently,I change new GPU(GTX680 to RTX3070). I install NewGPU driver and CUDA(vver.10) , cudNN(7.4) my DLC is do not work. please help me **I use DeepLabCut==2.1.9** Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using. Example: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut1.x or 2.x. Please complete the following information about your system: OS: [Windows 10] DeepLabCut Version: [2.1.9 and 2.2b5] Anaconda env used:Anaconda3 **Describe the problem** A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Please place code inside this:
Code output
